text: The teachers at busy bees are very good and helpful. I like the model essays and the many practices we got, which really helped with learning. Thanks to their guidance, I was able to do well in my higher Chinese o levels. Iâ€™m so thankful for their support over the years!

I have been in this tuition centre for 7 years and counting. They have consistently provided quality worksheets and example compositions. The teachers here are also helpful and knowledgeable. I highly recommend joining Busy Bees Learning Centre.

The teachers in Busy Bees Hillview are professional and patient, always ensuring every student keeps up with the lessons. The notes provided are concise, easy to understand, and cover all the points comprehensively. Each lesson is well-structured and highly engaging, making learning enjoyable and effective. A big thank you to the center and the teachers for their hard work and commitment to helping students excel!

The teachers there are very nice and are willing to help students whenever they have questions! They are friendly and the materials given during lessons are very useful. Helped me go from a B to an A for hcl Os
My daughter is with busy bees for many years. The school had a group of very dedicated teachers, and my gal's results improved over the years. Recommended!
